QuestData.Title: A Warrior's End
QuestData.Description:
Hail, $n! You've grown stronger since we sparred on the boat. You may one day become a warrior of great renown!
Speaking of which...
I encountered a ghost on the bridge to the north that demands to meet a true warrior.
Perhaps you can see what it wants.
It did not seem hostile. It might even be willing to help us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the strange ghost at the Darkmaul Bridge.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with the strange ghost at the Darkmaul Bridge.
